lines.text: God never said people make mistakes; where did you hear that shit? He said honor thy mother, and thy father, and thy Yankee contract!
Al, you're like a dad to me.
But I'm not your dad. I'm just a guy taking 15 percent.
I got you something. It's a chocolate baseball bat.

[takes the bat and examines the end, which is broken]
Did you drop it?
You don't have to yell, this is a different phone.
It has nothing to do with the phone, I just like yelling at you.
I never thought I'd say this, but screw the World Series.

[when asked his opinion of the pictures being shown Steve replies]
It's Batman!
Sometimes he goes without his cape.
